bug.short_desc: Problem with qx.ui.list.List().refresh() when new group is created and is visible

long_desc.thetext:
A tricky bug which occurs when a list item is selected, its group changes and the list needs to scroll down to show the item in its new location. A playground example: http://tinyurl.com/6qxsqg4 Select, for example, name7 from the list and then click the button on the top. The button will change this items group to "4", thus creating a new group. When the list tries to scroll to it you get an error.
As far as I can tell, the bug stems from the fact that in the refresh() function of the list, (qx.ui.list.List:621-622) the number of items in the list is being updated AFTER the selection is being updated. This results in a wrong number of items for the selection manager in the function getItemPosition (qx.ui.virtual.core.Axis:366), which then returns null since index >= itemCount.
I tried replacing these two rows, which then solves the problem for me, but I'm not sure if there are other adverse effects resulting form this switch. I would be happy to be informed if there are otherwise effects resulting from this change.
Best wishes, Omri
